sentences.en: A brisk walk in the fresh air can lift your mood and dissolve a winter depression.
sentences.cn: 在清新的空气中轻快地散散步，会让你心情愉快，一扫冬日的抑郁。

sentences.en: Agitate the mixture to dissolve the powder.
sentences.cn: 搅动混合物而使粉末溶化.

sentences.en: All of these will dissolve into nothingness.
Both salt and sugar dissolve easily in water.
sentences.cn: 盐和糖都容易溶解于水.

sentences.en: Both salt and sugar dissolve easily.
Dissolve the salt in a little boiled water.
sentences.cn: 将盐溶解在少许开水中。

sentences.en: Dissolve the salt in the warm water.
Drugs that dissolve blood clots can help people survive heart attacks.
sentences.cn: 能溶解血栓的药物会有助于治疗心脏病。

sentences.en: Fill a glass with water and dissolve this tablet in it.
sentences.cn: 倒杯水把药片放进去溶解了.

sentences.en: He lingered over the chocolate cake, letting each forkful slowly dissolve in his mouth.
sentences.cn: 他细细地品尝巧克力蛋糕，让每一口蛋糕在嘴里慢慢溶化。

sentences.en: Kaifu threatened to dissolve the Parliament and call an election.
sentences.cn: 卡夫威胁要解散议会并举行选举。

sentences.en: Lenny still could not dissolve the nagging lump of tension in his chest.
sentences.cn: 莱尼仍不能消除令他不安的紧张感。

sentences.en: Silver azide does not dissolve in water or in nitric acid.
sentences.cn: 叠氨化银不溶于水或硝酸.

sentences.en: The King agreed to dissolve the present commission.
sentences.cn: 国王同意解散目前的委员会。

sentences.en: The monarch had the power to dissolve parliament.
Warm the sugar slightly first to make it dissolve quicker.
sentences.cn: 先将糖稍稍加热，以使其溶解得更快些。

words.tran_cn: 可溶解的；可分解的；可解散的
分解，溶解；（议会等的）解散；（契约等的）解除；死亡
使溶解；使溶化（dissolve的过去分词）

trans.tran_en: if a solid dissolves, or if you dissolve it, it mixes with a liquid and becomes part of it
if a solid dissolves, or if you dissolve it, it mixes with a liquid and becomes part of it
if a solid dissolves, or if you dissolve it, it mixes with a liquid and becomes part of it
